feature.label: Regression Test Tool
feature.provider-name: Software Technology Group - Technische Universität Dresden - Germany
feature.description: Regression Test Tool (RTT) Eclipse Plugin. RTT is a regression test tool for tree-structured repositories. It provides a set of Java annotations used to specify the repository components to test and a test infrastructure for creating, updating and performing tests.
